General.Name: Sodas Sodyum Sanayi AS
General.Description: Sodas Sodyum Sanayii A.S. produces and sells chemicals in Turkey. The company offers natural sodium sulphate used in the production of detergent, textile dyeing, glass, paper, fertilizer, feed, and various chemicals; and sodium chloride (salt) used in food, textile, leather, detergent, feed, and health sectors, as well as used against icing on highways in winter. Sodas Sodyum Sanayii A.S. was incorporated in 1974 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.
General.Address: 1476 Sokak No:2 Aksoy Residence, Izmir, Turkey, 35220
